title: Ice Cube’s Big 3 Having a Good Day
itunes:title: Ice Cube’s Big 3 Having a Good Day
description:
There aren’t many areas where this man hasn’t been successful. Musician, actor, producer, philanthropist… just to name a few. Ice Cube joins us this week to discuss the Big 3’s season opener in Las Vegas. We learn about Cubes passions behind the camera, how Kobe’s retirement inspired him to create the Big 3 and why the Big 3 players might be more recognizable than those in the NBA finals.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
